{"id":577750844,"lang":"cpp","time":"4 months, 2 weeks","timestamp":1635295221,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"20 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/577750844/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Toeplitz Matrix","memory":"18.1 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    bool isToeplitzMatrix(vector<vector<int>>& mat) {\n        unordered_map<int,int>mp;\n        for(int i=0;i<mat.size();i++)\n            for(int j=0;j<mat[0].size();j++){\n                int k=i-j;\n                if(mp.count(k)){\n                    if(mp[k]!=mat[i][j]) return false;\n                }\n                else mp[k]=mat[i][j];\n            }\n        return true;\n            \n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"toeplitz-matrix"}
